q: What is the difference between backref and back_populates?
o: backref is one-sided, back_populates is explicit both sides

q: What is the purpose of session scoping in SQLAlchemy?

o: Property working at instance and class level
Base and derived in separate joined tables
Each class has complete separate table
Classical mapping of class to table
